Blast off with The New Frontier, a space documentary series that follows satellites and probes across the solar system. Each episode explores new discoveries, bold missions, and the ever-expanding edge of space exploration.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  From There to Here - Season 1 - Eps 1

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  From There to Here - Season 1 - Eps 1 - We’re kicking things off by looking at how we got from dreaming about space to actually getting there. From early rockets to satellites snapping pics of Earth, we’ll show you how space travel went from wild to awesome. Buckle up.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Return to The Moon - Season 1 - Eps 2

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Return to The Moon - Season 1 - Eps 2 -Robotic missions are making the Moon busy again! We’ll check out the latest lunar landers & orbiters, the science they’re sending home, & how new plans for moon bases could mean humans are heading back. The next giant leap? It’s coming.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Inner Worlds - Season 1 - Eps 3

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Inner Worlds - Season 1 - Eps 3 - Mercury and Venus are tough nuts to crack-one’s roasting close to the Sun, the other’s got clouds that’ll melt your lander. But that’s what makes them so awesome. We’ll dig into why these inner planets are so different from Earth.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Next Stop Mars - Season 1 - Eps 4

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Next Stop Mars - Season 1 - Eps 4 - Mars is calling, and we’re totally ready to answer. From wild rover missions to the tech that’ll get us there, we’ll break down what it takes to reach the Red Planet-and why everyone’s racing to be first. Mars, here we come.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Planet Makers - Season 1 - Eps 5

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Planet Makers - Season 1 - Eps 5 -How are planets built? We’re talking cosmic collisions, wild chemistry, & the mega forces that turn dust & gas to whole new worlds. From baby planets to  giants, we’ll break down the science that makes our solar system a pretty wild place.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  The Ice Giants - Season 1 - Eps 6

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  The Ice Giants - Season 1 - Eps 6 - Uranus and Neptune are the solar system’s mega mystery machines-icy, windy, & totally wild. We’ll dig into what makes these distant giants tick, from blue storms to rings, moons you’ve never heard of. Space is cold, but these planets are cool.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Moons of Olympus - Season 1 - Eps 7

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Moons of Olympus - Season 1 - Eps 7 - Some of the solar system’s wildest moons hang out near Jupiter and Saturn-think icy volcanoes, hidden oceans, and mega mysteries. We’ll explore these epic moons and the science that’s rewriting what we know about our cosmic neighborhood.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  The Sun - Season 1 - Eps 8

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  The Sun - Season 1 - Eps 8 - Ready to get up close with our local star? We’ll dive into the wild storms, mega flares, and the science that keeps the Sun burning bright. From solar power to space weather, it’s the hottest show in the solar system.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Exo Planets - Season 1 - Eps 9

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Exo Planets - Season 1 - Eps 9 - Planets beyond our solar system? Yep, they’re out there-by the thousands! We’ll break down how astronomers spot these wild worlds, what makes them so tricky to find, and why exoplanets might just be the best shot at finding alien life.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Edge of the Universe - Season 1 - Eps 10

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Edge of the Universe - Season 1 - Eps 10 - We’re heading to the edge-literally. Join us as we chase the wildest mysteries at the farthest reaches of space, from mind-bending galaxies to the secrets of cosmic expansion. The universe is huge, weird, and totally awesome.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Dark Side - Season 2 - Eps 10

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Dark Side - Season 2 - Eps 10 - Ever wonder what’s hiding on the Moon’s far side? We’ll shine a light on the mysteries lurking in the lunar shadows, from hidden craters to wild science surprises. Space is weird-and we’re here for it.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Stars Above - Season 2 - Eps 9

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Stars Above - Season 2 - Eps 9 - Ever look up and wonder what’s really out there? We’ll take you on a ride across the night sky, from familiar constellations to the wild mysteries hiding way beyond. Grab your telescope-space is about to get mega interesting!

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  First Light - Season 2 - Eps 8

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  First Light - Season 2 - Eps 8 - Catch the universe’s first sparks! We’ll dive into how the earliest stars and galaxies lit up the cosmos, turning darkness into a mega light show. It’s the ultimate origin story-and trust us, it’s totally stellar.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Danger Asteroids Ahead - Season 2 - Eps 7

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Danger Asteroids Ahead - Season 2 - Eps 7 - Ever worry about giant space rocks with our name on them? We get it. In this episode, we track asteroids flying close to Earth, meet the tech keeping watch, and see how scientists plan to dodge disaster. Space is a wild place.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Emissaries - Season 2 - Eps 6

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Emissaries - Season 2 - Eps 6 - Robots and probes are out there doing the heavy lifting for us, sending back epic data from across the solar system. We’ll show you how these mechanical emissaries explore where humans can’t, making space a less lonely and a lot more awesome.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Mars: Adapt or Leave - Season 2 - Eps 5

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Mars: Adapt or Leave - Season 2 - Eps 5 - Mars isn’t messing around. If we want to stick around, we’ll have to get creative-think wild habitats, new tech, and some mega problem-solving. Can we handle Mars, or will the Red Planet send us packing? Time to find out.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Shore to Shore - Season 2 - Eps 4

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Shore to Shore - Season 2 - Eps 4 - We’re charting new courses across alien oceans and mysterious coastlines. From wild tides on distant moons to the secrets hidden beneath icy surfaces, we’ll show you how shorelines shape worlds-ours and way, way beyond.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Orbit - Season 2 - Eps 3

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Orbit - Season 2 - Eps 3 - You know what keeps satellites, space stations, and even the Moon circling around? It’s all about orbit! We’ll break down how stuff stays up there, why orbits matter, and what happens when things go off track. Space is wild-let’s get in the loop!

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Getting There - Season 2 - Eps 2

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Getting There - Season 2 - Eps 2 - Getting to space isn’t a walk in the park. We’ll show you the wild rides, clever engineering, and mega teamwork it takes to launch, dock, and survive the trip. Buckle up-because getting there is half the adventure!

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  The Astronauts - Season 2 - Eps 1

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  The Astronauts - Season 2 - Eps 1 - Who signs up to rocket off this planet? Astronauts do-and they’re a special breed. We’ll dive into the wild training, mega teamwork, and guts it takes to launch into the unknown. Space isn’t easy, but these folks make it look awesome.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Interface - Season 3 - Eps 10

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Interface - Season 3 - Eps 10 - Explore the ionosphere—the dynamic interface between Earth and space. Discover how this layer of charged particles impacts radio, radar, satellites, and GPS, and why satellites are crucial for unlocking its mysteries.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Gravity - Season 3 - Eps 9

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Gravity - Season 3 - Eps 9 - Explore gravity, the universal force that keeps planets in orbit and our feet on the ground. Discover how space missions reveal gravity’s mysteries, from microgravity in orbit to the secrets this force is slowly giving up about our universe

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Cosmic collisions - Season 3 - Eps 8

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Cosmic collisions - Season 3 - Eps 8 - Space is a violent place where dust and rocks collide to form asteroids, planets, and stars. Explore massive cosmic collisions—from asteroids to galaxies—that shape the universe with bursts of light and energy over millions of years.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Living Planet - Season 3 - Eps 7

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Living Planet - Season 3 - Eps 7 - After 40 years of Earth observation, new technologies and massive data reveal our planet as a complex, ever-changing living system. Explore how satellites and science uncover the dynamic forces shaping our world

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Slingshot - Season 3 - Eps 6

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Slingshot - Season 3 - Eps 6 - Discover how spacecraft use planetary slingshot maneuvers—gravity assists—to gain speed and change course, enabling ambitious missions to the outer solar system and beyond in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Juno, Cassini and Beyond - Season 3 - Eps 5

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Juno, Cassini and Beyond - Season 3 - Eps 5 - The Cassini and Huygens missions unveil Saturn’s secrets, while Juno dives deep into Jupiter’s mysteries. Explore how these groundbreaking spacecraft, along with New Horizons, expand our understanding of the outer solar system.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Invasion Mars - Season 3 - Eps 4

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Invasion Mars - Season 3 - Eps 4 - For over 50 years, probes and landers have paved the way for Mars exploration. Now, new missions and technologies are preparing for humanity’s first steps on the Red Planet, aiming to unlock its secrets and establish a human presence on Mars.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Flight Status - Season 3 - Eps 3

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Flight Status - Season 3 - Eps 3 -

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Atmosphere - Season 3 - Eps 2

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Atmosphere - Season 3 - Eps 2 - Explore Earth’s atmosphere-our planet’s complex, protective envelope of gases. Discover how it shields us from space, sustains life, and why understanding its dynamics is crucial for our future in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Living in Space - Season 3 - Eps 1

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Living in Space - Season 3 - Eps 1 - Ever wonder what it’s like to call space home? We’ll show you how astronauts eat, sleep, and stay sane while floating above Earth. It’s weird, it’s wild, and honestly, it’s mega cool. Welcome to life in orbit with gravity - no problem!

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Where Are All the Aliens? - Season 4 - Eps 10

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Where Are All the Aliens? - Season 4 - Eps 10 - Scientists search the cosmos for extraterrestrial life but come up empty-handed. This episode explores why, examining the Fermi Paradox, the challenges of detection, and what our ongoing search reveals about life in the universe.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Proving Einstein - Season 4 - Eps 9

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Proving Einstein - Season 4 - Eps 9 - Scientists put Einstein’s theories to the test, using cutting-edge experiments and cosmic observations to confirm the reality of phenomena like gravitational waves and quantum entanglement, reshaping our understanding of the universe.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Cubesats - Season 4 - Eps 8

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Cubesats - Season 4 - Eps 8 - Cubesats, tiny modular satellites, have revolutionized space science. Once limited to low Earth orbit, they now enable ambitious missions across the solar system, driving innovation, rapid deployment, and new discoveries in space exploration.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Martian Attractions - Season 4 - Eps 7

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Martian Attractions - Season 4 - Eps 7 - Explore the latest breakthroughs in Martian exploration, from orbiters to ground rovers. Discover new sources of water and witness the dramatic dust storms shaping the ever-evolving story of the Red Planet.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Eyes to The Heavens - Season 4 - Eps 6

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Eyes to The Heavens - Season 4 - Eps 6 - Gaia and TESS, two powerful space telescopes, complete their missions to map stars and search for exoplanets, advancing our knowledge of the cosmos and paving the way for future astronomical discoveries.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Hyabusa 2 - Season 4 - Eps 5

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Hyabusa 2 - Season 4 - Eps 5 - Japan’s Hayabusa2 mission reaches asteroid Ryugu, collecting samples to unlock secrets of the solar system’s origins and planetary defense. The return of these samples to Earth marks a breakthrough in space exploration.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Mercury or Bust - Season 4 - Eps 4

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Mercury or Bust - Season 4 - Eps 4 - Explore the challenges and triumphs of sending spacecraft to Mercury. Discover how missions like MESSENGER reveal the planet’s extreme environment, unique geology, and what Mercury teaches us about the origins of our solar system.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Tickets Please - Season 4 - Eps 3

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Tickets Please - Season 4 - Eps 3 - Explore how satellites and space technology revolutionize global transportation. From tracking flights to managing railways and shipping, discover how these innovations keep our world moving safely and efficiently.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Set Course for The Heart of The Sun - Season 4 - Eps 2

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Set Course for The Heart of The Sun - Season 4 - Eps 2 - Spacecraft embark on daring missions to study the Sun up close. Discover how new technology helps us unlock the secrets of solar storms, solar wind, and the forces that shape our solar system in this illuminating episode.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Cryosphere - Season 4 - Eps 1

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Cryosphere - Season 4 - Eps 1 - Explore how satellites and space missions monitor Earth’s cryosphere—its ice sheets, glaciers, and frozen regions—revealing the impacts of climate change, rising sea levels, and the urgent need for global action.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - The Next Big Leaps - Season 5 - Eps 10

info.plot: The New Frontier  - The Next Big Leaps - Season 5 - Eps 10 - Visionary scientists and engineers reveal the next breakthroughs in space exploration, from advanced propulsion to new missions, showing how today’s innovations will shape humanity’s future among the stars.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Peering into the Abyss - Season 5 - Eps 09

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Peering into the Abyss - Season 5 - Eps 09 - Cutting-edge telescopes and technology take us to the edge of the universe, uncovering new cosmic mysteries and expanding our understanding of deep space in this thrilling episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Webb of life - Season 5 - Eps 8

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Webb of life - Season 5 - Eps 8 - The James Webb Space Telescope reveals breathtaking new details about distant galaxies and the origins of life, transforming our understanding of the cosmos in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Oceans in the Sky - Season 5 - Eps 7

info.plot: The New Frontier  -  Oceans in the Sky - Season 5 - Eps 7 - Scientists uncover the presence of water in unexpected places throughout our solar system, revealing how “oceans in the sky” could reshape the search for life beyond Earth in this fascinating episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Mountains in the dark - Season 5 - Eps 6

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Mountains in the dark - Season 5 - Eps 6 - Explorers uncover mysterious mountain ranges hidden in the dark regions of our solar system. Advanced technology and planetary science reveal new insights into these cosmic landscapes in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Increasing Orbit - Season 5 - Eps 5

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Increasing Orbit - Season 5 - Eps 5 - Discover how satellites and spacecraft achieve and maintain higher orbits, enabling new missions and expanding our reach into space. Explore the technology and science behind increasing orbit in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Earths Evil Twin - Season 5 - Eps 4

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Earths Evil Twin - Season 5 - Eps 4 - Once similar to Earth, Venus is now a hostile world. Explore how Venus became “Earth’s evil twin,” what its electric field reveals, and what this means for planetary evolution in this eye-opening episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Rising Tides - Season 5 - Eps 3

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Rising Tides - Season 5 - Eps 3 - Rising sea levels threaten coastlines and reshape our planet. Explore how satellites and space technology track these changes and reveal the global impact of climate-driven tides in this episode of The New Frontier.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  -  Moon Shine - Season 5 - Eps 2

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Moon Shine - Season 5 - Eps 2 - Scientists use advanced lunar probes and telescopes to uncover the Moon’s hidden features, revealing new clues about its origins, resources, and the role it plays in Earth’s history and future exploration.

episodes.name: The New Frontier  - Star Light, Star Bright - Season 5 - Eps 1

info.plot: The New Frontier  - Star Light, Star Bright - Season 5 - Eps 1 - Scientists launch two advanced space probes to orbit closer to the Sun than ever before, unlocking new insights into how solar activity affects Earth and revealing mysteries that were once only theoretical.
Sentient machines. Big questions. Zero chill. Unearth dives deep into the wild side of AI and what it means to be human—one mind-bending mystery at a time.

episodes.name: Unearth  - Life Beyond Earth - Season 1 - Eps 1

info.plot: Unearth  - Life Beyond Earth - Season 1 - Eps 1 - Unearth explores the search for extraterrestrial life, examining scientific breakthroughs, missions to distant worlds, and the profound implications of discovering life beyond Earth.

episodes.name: Unearth  - The Next Great Extinction Event - Season 1 - Eps 2

info.plot: Unearth  - The Next Great Extinction Event - Season 1 - Eps 2 - As scientists uncover alarming evidence of a looming mass extinction, Unearth explores the causes, consequences, and urgent choices facing humanity in the fight to prevent the next great loss of life on Earth.

episodes.name: Unearth  - A.I.: The code for consciousness - Season 1 - Eps 3

info.plot: Unearth  - A.I.: The code for consciousness - Season 1 - Eps 3 - Unearth takes viewers on an immersive journey through science, space, and technology, uncovering groundbreaking discoveries from the past and bold visions for the future. Explore new worlds and rediscover the wonders of our own

episodes.name: Unearth  - GERM WARFARE: Fighting the Super Bugs - Season 1 - Eps 4

info.plot: Unearth  - GERM WARFARE: Fighting the Super Bugs - Season 1 - Eps 4 - investigates the quest to find life beyond our planet, following scientists as they search distant worlds and analyze cosmic signals, revealing how the discovery of extraterrestrial life.

Unearth  - Nuclear 2.0 - Season 1 - Eps 5 - Unearth examines the promise and risks of next-generation nuclear energy. Can advanced reactors help fight climate change and replace fossil fuels, despite past nuclear accidents? Discover the future of clean power in “Nuclear 2.0.”

episodes.name: Unearth  - AMBER: A 100-million-year-old treasure unearthed - Season 1 - Eps 6

info.plot: Unearth  - AMBER: A 100-million-year-old treasure unearthed - Season 1 - Eps 6 - The discovery of ancient amber, revealing secrets preserved for 100 million years. Explore how this golden treasure unlocks mysteries of prehistoric life and reshapes our understanding of Earth’s distant past.
Manifesting is popular these days and you’re probably interested in seeking positive changes in your life.

Welcome to Meditations for Manifesting, how to bring yourself back into alignment with the greater good and pray from a place of wholeness and true faith. Episode one is all about the emotions. Begin with breath awareness, establishing a calm and steady mind. Cultivate a judgment free attitude as you explore the inner world of your thoughts and feelings.

Come back into alignment through awareness of the body. Use the breath as an anchor to cultivate present moment awareness. Redirect the attention from the external world to the inner world, beginning with the sensation of breath along the inside of the nostrils. Learn to feel what is rather than generating a story. Allow yourself to feel safe and loved through the practice of mindfulness.

Join Kino for a 20 minute meditation on love and tuning into the flow of love in personal relationships. Begin your practice of mindful awareness by feeling the breath. Allow the breath to become an anchor that redirects the mind to the inner experience. Check in with the physical body and the sensations arising there and filtering into awareness. Tap into the energy of the heart and the love that flows there, allow this feeling to spread to all beings and yourself.

Start your meditation practice with a few moments of mindful awareness built around the movement of the breath and the sensations of the body. Cultivate equanimity as you notice the rise and fall of physical and emotional feelings. Let Kino help you drop down beneath the frequency of thought, where you can get in touch with your innate wholeness. Work with understanding your natural completeness, as you explore concepts of attachment and aversion.

True faith is a valuable ally when facing obstacles. Begin practice with a few minutes of mindfulness, focusing on the natural, unopposed quality of the breath. Become aware of the sensations in the body. Learn to accept thought as thought and emotion as emotion. Practice equanimity as challenge arises, settling into the calm and equanimous mind.

Tune into the breath as an entry way to the present moment. Use this awareness to call your energy back into yourself and cultivate an increasing sense of wellbeing. Feel the sensation of the body and practice acceptance of whatever pleasant or unpleasantness arises. Focus the mind and notice the quality and texture of your thoughts and emotions. Once you settle into practice turn your awareness more fully to the inner experience, planting the seeds of happiness and wellbeing.

This meditation for manifestation will bring gratitude into your life. Settle the attention on the breath as you drop below the frequency of thought and into a more receptive state. Open up to the field of arising sensation and connect a sense of gratitude for the body as a tool in your mindfulness practice. Cultivate awareness of your inner experience, moving away from loops of thoughts and into a state of equanimity, alignment, deep peace and gratitude.

This meditation for manifestation begins with a few moments of intentional presence. Begin by noticing the feeling of the breath and let this be your gateway to practice. You will also develop an awareness of sensations in the body and the movements of the mind. Kino will guide you into the sense of freedom that can arise from the watching of consciousness that is the act of mindfulness. Planting seeds of peace amidst a stream of anxiety and stress is the heart of today\'s practice.

Join Kino for a 20 minute meditation that will guide you towards a sense of wholeness and connection to faith. Settle the attention on subtle sensations of breath moving in and out of the body and allow this to coax the mind into calming down. Observe the present moment, from a place of receptivity and embodiment, becoming love and stepping into unity with the heartbeat of the universe.

Begin practice with a few minutes of mindfulness, feeling the breath and sensation in the body as a way of cultivating inward focus. Shift into a contemplative state, settling the mind below the frequency of thought. Learn to label inner processes in a way that will help you understand the nature of thought and emotion. As the quality of your awareness shifts deeper, Kino will skillfully guide you into a state of contemplation.

Join Kino for a focus on calm and equanimity as your meditation begins today. Bring your attention to the quality of the breath and let this awareness be a bridge into the field of presence. From this place learn to listen for inner guidance and to be receptive to signs that you\'re on the right path. Anchor yourself in your own inner goodness and let this be a powerful positive reinforcement in your life.
Welcome to the perfect place to start your yoga journey!

This class centers around commitment, so Kino is asking you start by going all in. The intention here is to get you on your mat every day, even if you don’t make it through the whole class, so that you can cultivate greater awareness of your body and mind. In this class we’ll build up to a steady, well constructed Down Dog by focusing on the shoulders in a series of preparatory postures.

So much of Kino’s personal journey through yoga has been about learning to be strong. That’s why she is so excited to share this class that uses plank pose as a bridge to connecting with your own inner reserves. Tune in and learn alignment and articulation in the body that will help you tap into new levels of strength. This sequence will teach you to feel and engage the back body and deep core in ways that support your yoga journey.

Venture deep into the realm of body and mind in this sequence focused on an experience of santosha, the yogic notion of contentment. Join Kino as she skillfully uses upward facing dog as a tool for understanding this radical acceptance. Start with a short meditation on the breath and a feeling of being ok with the sensations in the body. Then begin the physical practice by awakening the central axis of the spine, extending and twisting your way through some warm up positions.

This class is about finding balance. Begin with some mindful warmups focused on giving you a sense of embodiment. Explore foundational alignment for balance by feeling the relationship between the pelvis, the central axis of the spine and the rest of the body. Carry that intention of getting acquainted with oneself into today’s focus, the tree pose. Kino will guide you through various modifications, using props where helpful, so that you can find a connection to your own steadiness and vitality.

Today’s practice is an exploration of healing, the deep inner work that yoga opens you up to. Begin with a seated practice for checking in with breath and body, cultivating an attitude of complete acceptance. This class offers up a standing forward fold, Padangusthasana, as a vehicle for understanding what yoga is. Kino will teach you the important details of alignment while keeping a focus on not pushing too hard and instead releasing and trusting the process.

Tune into the truth of who you are underneath the thoughts, using the breath and practice as a means of transformation into true self. This class uses chair pose to explore both physical embodiment and to fuel our inner journey into yoga. Join us for a practice that will bring awareness into your hips and legs, using props to support the postures where needed. Let Kino guide you into a stronger awareness of Agni, the inner fire that burns through impurities and helps the mind see clearer.

Today we explore awareness through breath, movement and the posture Virabhadrasana B. Flow through a series of warm up’s and then detail the points of alignment and the mythological story behind these challenging Warrior Poses. We’ll puts focus on Yoga as a feeling journey. Join Kino in developing awareness of the pure, non-judgmental ‘is-ness’ of yoga.

Invite the mind into harmony as you take it nice and easy with today’s posture, Janu Sirsasana. Join Kino as she warms up your body with some slow and steady movements. Hold on to that ease and flow as you practice Janu Sirsasana, moving into external rotation of the hips and a nice stretch through the hamstrings. As you practice allow the mind to drop its antagonism towards the body, and instead allow the mind and body move into unity and a sense of welcome wholeness.

Invite kindness into your body, using Marichasana A as a framework for integrating tenderness into your practice. Let Kino guide you through a series of mindful, preparatory postures that bring awareness into the legs, hips and shoulders. This increased awareness will aid you as you move into the forward fold that today’s practice revolves around. Use props where needed so that you can cultivate a kind and friendly attitude towards your body.

You can be happy for no reason at all… Happiness can be our natural state. Start today with attention at the heart center and the recollection of an uplifting memory. Holding on to that feeling, move into practice with a warm up rooted in backbending and sun salutations. Next, follow Kino through through a hip opening sequence. As we approach today’s pinnacle pose, Baddha Konasana, remember that there is no need for the body to be in any particular place.

This class is centered around a quality that is perhaps the very essence of being a yogi: Compassion. We’ll use the posture Shalabhasana, which is a heart opening backbend, to help you find that compassionate center within yourself. Begin with a moment of loving kindness meditation followed by some physical warm up focused on spinal extension. Follow Kino through a series of backbends that will be a little challenging, but also connect you to the breath and the space around the heart.

A grateful heart is a yogis heart! Today the lesson is built around the standing posture Parsvakonasana A. Begin with a moment of meditation and then flow through a warm up sequence that will calm the mind and guide you towards appreciation of the gifts of breath and life. Cultivate a sense of open, thankful awareness as we approach the extended side angle position, stretching the psoas and creating a sense of openness in the hips.

For many of us, patience does not come naturally. this class brings us an opportunity to understand patience through the twisting posture Marichasana C. Join Kino as she guides you into embodiment through breath awareness and gentle movement. Be patient and kind with your body as you move into the practice and a deeper twist through the spinal axis.

Open your heart to an experience of pure joy. We’ll use Happy Baby pose to explore what yoga truly is. Flow through child’s pose, puppy pose, squats and hip openers before making your way into the sweet release of Happy Baby. No judgement, no fight, no force… use this practice to touch the unscathed, joyful innocence within you.

Today we go deeper into understanding what yoga is as we explore mindfulness and the pose Trikonasana. Join Kino as she guides you through a physical practice with a focus on remaining present and judgement free. Use triangle pose as an opportunity to be present with and accepting towards whatever arises in the body and mind as you practice.

Don’t be intimidated, but today’s lesson is on discipline. This class is all about how to get on your mat with discipline and enjoy it. To find comfort and determination in Navasana Kino will guide you towards just the right amount of front body engagement as well as a helpful awareness in the deep core. Mix your discipline with a fun loving attitude and feel that energy that comes when you rise up to a challenge.

Abhyasa is the sanskrit word for practice. Kino wants to help you find the playful spirit in your heart, even as you commit to practice. Begin the class with breath awareness and some mindful movement. After we warm up we’ll play with forearm plank and leg engagement before moving into the challenge of full Dolphin Pose. Finish class with some reflection on the power of practice and a well earned rest.

Yoga is a path to personal awakening. In today’s lesson we will use the crescent lunge to awaken the energy at the core of your being. Begin with centering breath work and then flow through some warm ups and sun salutations as you bring awareness to the energetic life of the body. Take it nice and easy as you make your way into Anjaneyasana, finding and being at peace with your individual limits in the posture.

When you practice regularly, you create the opportunity for wisdom to arise in you. We will use side plank as the vehicle of awareness that might help us glimpse the truth of any given moment. Warm up with Sun Salutations before moving through several side plank positions that will help bring insight into state of the body and mind. By deepening our ability to turn the attention inward we deepen our ability to touch true wisdom.

Lolasana is a challenging position that offers a unique opportunity to experience balance and equanimity in both the body and mind. Kino is here to help you find an experience of the equanimous mind, which is not moved by pleasure or pain. This class will guide you through a series of drills that might induce a state annoyance, so that you have an opportunity to practice returning to calm. Through this practice you will face your difficulties and make peace with being exactly where you are.

The traditional definition of yoga is unity. We will explore this concept through the restorative Pigeon Pose. Begin practice with a reflection on the connection between breath, body and mind. Next, move through a series of long holds in child’s pose, puppy poses and forward folding. Take a supported hip opener using props if you have them handy and then move into another long hold, this time in Pigeon Pose.

When you start practicing you’ll notice energy coming into the body and clarity into the mind. Today’s posture is Bakasana, a powerful arm balance that will help you find that energy in the arms, the core and the entire body. The crane pose, Bakasana in sanskrit, and other arm balances are a great way to generate energy and prana and bring it up the spine.

Today’s practice is all about love. Start practice by tuning into breath and body, bringing a special attention to the heartspace. Take a moment for feeling into the vibration of the heart, welcoming a feeling of receptivity. Warm yourself up as Kino brings extra attention to opening the chest and front body. Next we segue into finding and loving your particular expression of Gomukhasana, the cow facing posture.

Today’s lesson is about sanctuary and how to find a place of calm and peace deep within yourself. We’ll use the backbend Ustrasana, or Camel Pose, to dive into that inner world. Kino will guide you through warm ups and then a series of backbends that will challenge you. The idea is to work outside of your comfort zone, just a little, so you seek a source of strength from deep within.

Our asana focus in this class is on a single leg lift known as Utthita Hasta Padangustasana. We’ll us the pose to explore the concept of forgiveness, as this is a very challenging posture and you’ll have to forgive yourself over and over as you learn it. Firm the core and engage the legs as you flow through a warm up. Next, listen in to Kino’s expert insights for finding balance in this gateway pose of the Ashtanga method.

Todays class offers an opportunity to understand practice as prayer. Join Kino as she uses Digasana, also known as Warrior 3, as an opportunity to feel the quiet turning inward of the mind. The Warrior postures help you connect to a sense of inner strength. Let Kino guide you through communion with self and you higher power as you flow through a challenging, prop supported balancing sequence.

One of the key lessons of yoga is stillness, known as Nirodaha in Sanskrit. We will use the headstand position to practice approaching situations with calm and serenity. This class will help you build a strong base and increase awareness in the parts of your body that will support this inversion, especially the core. Don’t be afraid as we approach this challenge, Kino will offer variations so that all levels can experience the meditative stillness of headstand.

Om Shanti. Peace is such an integral part of what yoga is that we usually start and end every class with an invocation of it. This class will utilize a seated forward fold to tap into this yogic sense of tranquility. Today’s lesson will increase awareness in pelvis and hips so that we can pivot deeper into Paschimottanasana, the forward fold we visit a few times in the Ashtanga method.

Today’s lesson is on Spirit and how to tune into that space beyond the physical. The vehicle for this deep awareness will be the shoulder stand, Halasana. This class will take you mindfully through warmups and then into several accessible variations of today’s inversion practice. You will be invited to drop deeper down into a space of peace as Kino encourages you to tune deeply into the subtle vibrations of the inner body.

This class is built around Bridge Pose, a simple backbend. We will us this lifting of the back from the floor to bring energy into the body and explore the yogic notion of Freedom. This class will help you liberate the spine and find just the right depth for your body in backbending. Join Kino as she uses asana to share the essential journey of yoga, is the integration of breath, body and mind. When these 3 come into alignment you experience the clear space of freedom, Kaivalya in Sanskrit.

name: Foodie Road Trip with Skye Estroff

info.plot: We’re driving to the tastiest places in the US Skye Estroff tours the towns she’s discovered are hidden gems.
Take a tour around Vidalia, GA to find southern comfort food, outrageous sandwiches, and homemade donuts. Skye uses local pecans in a family recipe.
Learn what it takes to make the best shrimp & grits, red velvet cake, and deviled eggs in Alpharetta. Skye takes a creative spin on a favorite blueberry recipe with some help from a local.

episodes.name: Skye and the Tybeans of Tybee Island

info.plot: Get a kick out of this quirky coastal town, Tybee Island. See why the "Tybeans" rave about frogmore stew and table-sized pizzas.

episodes.name: Peeling Back the Layers of Vidalia

info.plot: Skye takes us back to Vidalia, GA, where she digs into oversized steaks and New York-style Italian food. Learn more about Vidalia\'s world-renowned sweet onions and the people who make up this south Georgia town.

episodes.name: Casting the Net Wide on Tybee Island

info.plot: Tybee Island is home to fun locals, a deep history, and, of course, seafood so delicious that it, alone, was enough reason for Skye to make a return trip.
From lobster pasta to poke donuts, Alpharetta has it all! See what makes this town worth another visit, then cook a classic sweet potato souffle with Skye.

Grab your blocks, straps, chairs and bolsters and get ready to get your yoga on with Kino. This course is made up of classes that will both challenge and support you on your yoga journey. Learn to use props in ways that will help you find healthy alignment and also make you stronger. These are yoga flows that incorporate the fundamentals of yoga and are accessible to everyone!
Dive into the fundamentals of yoga with this sequence that builds up to downward facing dog.
Join Kino for a short, gentle practice that is centered around core engagement and the plank pose.
A restorative flow that stretches and warms the body with a prop assisted sequence. This class has a focus on the fundamental pose Upward Facing Dog.
Join Kino (and her mom!) for a 20 minute practice focused on Utkatasana, the chair pose. This prop supported, gentle flow encourages a healthy balance of flexibility and strength.
A relaxing practice that utilizes props to both get you stronger and allow you to relax more. This class flows through standing poses and focuses on the forward fold called Prasarita Padottanasana.

Tune in to the quality of the breath and how the body is feeling as you begin this gentle all levels class. Flow through movements that will warm up the body and prepare you for Trikonasana, the triangle pose.
A gentle flow that incorporates the fundamentals of yoga and builds up to the arm balance Bakasana, the crane pose.
Feel the depth and power of the breath in this class that builds up to the hip opening posture Baddha Konasana.
Join Kino for a chair yoga class that builds up to Parsvakonasana, the extended side angle pose.
A flow that thoroughly warms up the spine and builds up to the laying backbend called Shalabhasana.
This practice takes you on a journey through the fundamentals of yoga and culminates in a gentle backbend, the bridge pose.
This practice starts with breath awareness before moving into a prop supported physical practice. Use a chair to make the challenge of balance work more accessible.
A practice that builds up to tree pose. Get rooted into the fundamentals of yoga practice including breath and balance.
This 20 minute practice starts with the basics, building a connection to breath and body. Flow through standing poses that build up to a prop supported variation of Parsvottanasana.
Begin with awareness of breath and body sensation in this gentle yoga class. You will find yourself present and relaxed by the end of this forward folding focused sequence.
This class is accessible to all, incorporates yoga fundamentals and builds up to Janu Sirsasana A.
Tune in to the inner experience in this short flow that details a healthy use of breath and body in your yoga practice. This class builds up to Marichasana A.
Come practice an accessible, energizing flow that incorporates yoga basics and builds up to Navasna, the boat pose.
Cultivate a mindful state as you prepare for practice, feeling into the breath and body. Flow through a prop supported sequence that builds up to Purvottanasana.
A practice that explores the fundamentals of yoga and backbending. The class builds up to Ustrasana, the camel pose.
Come explore supported hip opening with Kino. This class incorporates yoga fundamentals and builds up to Pigeon Pose.
Begin this gentle flow with a few moments of mindfulness, then explore the basics of yoga as we build up to a supported practice of side plank.
This class establishes a connection to breath, body and mind before flowing into the poses. Use props to support your practice, which builds up to the shoulderstand, Halasana.
A gentle flow that includes yoga fundamentals and builds up to sirsasana, the headstand.
This flow uses a chair supported sun salutation to get you started then flows through standing poses before finishing up with some accessible work in the arm balance Lolasana.
Find the meditation position, (legs crossed, seated in a chair or laying down) that is accessible for you.
A relaxing practice that incorporates the fundamentals of yoga and has a focus on reclining twists.

Join Mark Robberds for a course that he planned and put together based on his own personal practice and research. These practices are meant to supplement and compliment your regular ashtanga yoga practice. The classes in this course will help you develop a better understanding of the human body’s movement potential and what constitutes functional movement. These techniques have helped Mark improve his own practice and now they can help you too.
Sit down with Mark Robberds to discover what this Movement Essentials course is all about.

Use this practice to work with improving your 3-dimensional breathing, expanding through the front, side, and back of body. For this class you’ll want to sit upright with a straight spine, using props for comfort and alignment.

One of Mark’s favorite morning routines, this is a slow-moving practice featuring static holds that will help you soften and open up through the entire body to enhance mobility and performance. Use this as a supplement to improve your everyday practice.

Join Mark Robberds for a class that breaks down and investigates each of the main movement positions that are involved in the traditional Sun Salutations. This is a slow-moving class that involves using static holds and micro-movements to enhance mobility and performance.

Follow along with Mark Robberds as he walks your through a few techniques that will help you improve your form and function in standing poses. This is a slow-moving practice that involves static holds and micro movements designed to help you improve mobility and performance.

In this practice, Mark will show you a brief routine he uses to work with the mechanics of forward folds. This is a slow-moving class that involved using static holds and micro-movements to enhance mobility and performance.

Join Mark for a class that explores the main patterns of the seated postures from the Ashtanga Yoga Primary series. This is a slow moving practice that involves micro movements to help you improve the form and function of these poses.

Body Intelligence with Kino MacGregor is a 7-class course that’s designed to serve as an introduction to the subtle body. Use this series when you want to awaken new, deeply seeded sensations and feel the body as it’s never been felt before. Join Kino as she guides you through a set of practices that will help you drop your mind into the intelligence of the body and transform every aspect of your life.

Join Kino for a class that’s all about backbends and the journey of listening. Begin to tap into the subtle body as you move through this mindful, 25-minute backbending practice. Talk to your muscles and joints and listen to them as you find the strength and flexibility to move through this practice, all while bringing your awareness to various places in the body.

In the 40-minute practice, Kino leads you through a journey with the breath. Move into the inner space of the body by reconnecting with the power and the vehicle of the breath. Discover the child-like innocence of your body as you engage in this breath focused practice with awareness and intention.

The journey of awakening the hips is very much a journey of self-love and self-discovery. Join Kino for a 30-minute practice that’s all about learning to love your hips. Avoid the temptation to judge and manipulate or force your flexibility by training the mind to be present amidst what may be the murky territory of the inner body around the hips.

Join Kino for a class that’s all about inversions and the mindset of awakening. This 30-minute practice invites you to seize the opportunity to remain present and awake in the challenge of the practice. Begin the journey of turning yourself upside down to awaken the sleeper within.

This session is all about sitting with the hamstrings and forward bends in a state of equanimity. Join Kino as she leads you on a journey to healing. Learn to sit with your discomfort and begin to uncover and understand the intelligent messages that come from within. 25 minutes.

The journey of yoga is a journey of deep intimacy with the body. In this class you will begin to explore the pelvic floor and the concept of forgiveness. Allow the natural intelligence of the inner body to shine cultivate of deep awareness of the intimate, inner space of the body in this 30 minute practice.

The final class in this series is all about feeling into and entering the heart space through the vehicle of twists. The unfelt body is a reservoir of the unlived life. Unlock your potential for healing by connecting with these deep inner spaces of the body and just feeling.

Edward van Gils the Godfather of street football knows how the game can help ex-inmates. Now he’s joining up with legends of the game to see how the sport can help those inside and outside prison.

episodes.name: Streetkings in Jail: Colombia with Juan Pablo Ángel

info.plot: Edward van Gils and Juan Pablo Ángel head to Bogotá, where football offers a way out—but not for all. At Carcèl Distrital, Colombia’s largest prison, Streetkings In Jail: Colombia explores what happens when the game isn’t enough.

episodes.name: Streetkings in Jail: Germany with Kevin Kurányi

info.plot: Edward van Gils and Kevin Kurányi explore how football breaks down barriers and builds identity in and out of prison. Streetkings In Jail: Germany is a powerful story of integration, redemption, and the unifying power of the game.

episodes.name: Streetkings in Jail: Brazil with Gilberto Silva

info.plot: Edward van Gils and Gilberto Silva visit a youth prison in São Paulo where football offers hope, purpose, and a way out. Street Kings in Jail: Brazil reveals how the next generation finds peace and potential through the game.

episodes.name: Streetkings in Jail: The Netherlands with Ruud Gullit

info.plot: Edward van Gils and Ruud Gullit return to Amsterdam and head to Veenhuizen prison to see how football is being used to rebuild lives behind bars. Streetkings In Jail: The Netherlands is a powerful story of redemption, roots, and the game that changes everything.
In Modern Day Gladiators we take an unprecedented look inside the vibrant world of esports. With the fanbase growing every year the competitions just keep getting bigger…and so do the cash prizes.
FaZe Clan INTZ and Gen.G are lining up for major events and they’re hoping to claim esports glory. The prize for winning can be huge but so is the personal sacrifice to make it happen.
Through the eyes of their most passionate members we dive into the communities that add to the diverse world of esports – from cosplaying in Brazil to underground gaming tournaments in Korea.
The life of an esports star isn’t always perfect and fanbases can turn toxic. We meet the individuals who’re battling the haters and the burnouts that can impact the lives of gamers.
Gaming franchises like FaZe Clan and San Francisco Shock have their eyes on the future of esports. They’re not just aiming to win matches – they’re creating a cultural movement.
Life of Cards offers a thrilling insight into the lifestyles of ten of the best professional poker players in the world.
Joe Hachem Australian poker hero fights for victory at the Aussie Millions while building a family imperium to give room to the next generation.
Carefree Sunday child Nicolau Villa-Lobos who encountered bad luck and turned it into a new career.
Vanessa Selbst one of the most successful and skillful female poker player looks beyond the poker scene and aspires a new career.
Astrophysicist model and metalhead Liv Boeree who reached for the stars and became a poker celebrity.
Homeless poker millionaire Faraz Jaka who has taken efficiency and travelling light to the next level.

Poker legend Bertrand Elky Grospellier is on a mission to reclaim his edge—at the table and in life. With his girlfriend by his side, he dives into the real and virtual worlds in search of purpose, passion, and the perfect hand.
Success in poker does not come easily: for Japanese poker player Akira Ohyama it takes hard work long hours perseverance and an unshakable faith.
Former magician and poker celebrity Antonio Esfandiari enjoys the perks of his high end life to the max but never forgets where he came from.
The most profitable poker player of all time Daniel Negreanu tries to stay on top of his game and give back to the country that brought him fame and fortune.
Road trip with all-American family man and anti-hero Chris Moneymaker who became a poker celebrity overnight and gives a new meaning to stardom.
